spec.name: Container
spec.query:
import "array"

dynamic = from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == v.Host)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> keep(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => "_value")
  |> unique()

static = array.from(
    rows: [
        {
            _value: "(All)",
        },
    ],
)

union(tables: [static, dynamic])
